text:
QUESTION 92) BIENVENDO BRASILIA EL GOBIERNO OF BRAZIL, BY MEDIA DEL MINISTERIO DE LA CULTURE Y DEL INSTITUTE HISTORICAL HISTORICAL Y ARTISTICAL NATIONAL (IPHAN), FROM LA BIENVENDA A LOS PARTICIPANTS FROM LA 34th SESIÓN DEL PATRIMONIO WORLD, ENTY PERFORMED La Organición de las Naciones United for Educación, La Ciencia y La Cultura (UNESCO).
Backed by La convincion del Heritage World, 1972, the Committee brings together en su 34th Sesión Más de 180 delegations Nationales to deliberate on Las Nuevas candidates y el state of conservación y of riesgo de los bienes ya declared World Heritage, based on analyst Del International Consejo of Monuments and Sites (ICOMOS), Del International Center for Estudio de La Preservación and La Restaución del Cultural Heritage (ICCROM) Y from La Unión International to La Conservación de la Naturaza (IUCN).
The World Heritage Committee is regularly gathering to deliberate on actions aimed at conservation and preserving the World Heritage. Among the tasks attributed to the national delegations that participated in the 34th session of the World Heritage Committee,
A) Participation in meetings of the International Council of Monuments and Sites.
B) Conducting the reception ceremony of the World Heritage Convention.
C) Organization of analyzes made by the Ministry of Brazilian Culture.
D) Discussion on the state of conservation of the goods already declared world assets.
E) Structuring of the next meeting of the World Herit Committee.
